The option that BEST facilitates the effectiveness of cybersecurity incident response is C. Increasing communication with all incident response stakeholders. 

Effective communication is crucial during a cybersecurity incident response as it ensures that all stakeholders, such as IT teams, management, and relevant departments, are aware of the incident and can contribute to its resolution. By increasing communication, teams can share information, coordinate their efforts, and make informed decisions to mitigate the impact of the incident. This includes sharing updates on the incident's progress, identifying potential vulnerabilities, and implementing necessary security measures.

Selected Answer: B
B. verify to recipients the integrity of an email message.

An email digital signature is a cryptographic technique that is used to verify the integrity of an email message. It ensures that the content of the email has not been altered during transmission or tampered with in any way. The digital signature is generated using a private key that is unique to the sender and can only be decrypted using the corresponding public key. When the recipient receives the email, they can verify the digital signature using the sender's public key, which confirms that the email has not been modified since it was signed by the sender. This helps to ensure the authenticity and integrity of the email message.

Selected Answer: B
